title: Proportional-Integral Controller Function Block
description: This function block implements a Proportional-Integral (PI) controller. It takes an input value and adjusts its output based on given proportional and integral gains, while enforcing limits on the output. The block also includes a reset functionality and determines whether the output has reached its limits.
name: FT_PIW

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value to be controlled.

input.name: KP
input.description: The proportional gain for the controller.

input.name: KI
input.description: The integral gain for the controller.

input.name: LIM_L
input.description: The lower limit for the output.

input.name: LIM_H
input.description: The upper limit for the output.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output value of the controller.

output.name: LIM
output.description: Indicator that output is at limit.
